title: How to get 95% or above - Quora

response.answer_text: Jahirul Hasan With the right amount of dedication, time management and presentation, every answer script marks can turn out to be a high score. “Self-belief and hard work will always earn you success”. Make a study PlannerMake your study planner and include every subjects don’t leave anyone. For a day give some hours to particular subjects, subjects which you finds are hard schedule on top in the early morning. Then scoring and one interesting subject keep side for day time while you get bored of study pick your interesting subject and your time will not waste just looking at book. Don’t forget to take a break in between. Revision is important thing, learn today and revise tomorrow. This key will make you succeed and help you to score good in board exam. Manage your time effectively“if you didn’t care for time, time will never give you a chance to care for the thing you needed” That’s simple time is one of the most dangerous thing, you should take care of. Try studying 4 or 5 hours daily. Make a chart for your daily routine and give maximum time to your study. It will help you reduce anxiety and focus on studying. Write your own notesWriting is a good habit to learn effectively. Always write the subject wise notes including definitions and formulae over the topics what you are studying. At the time of examination these notes will help you in your revision. Review previous Test papers:The only way to success is Practice, Practice and Practice. Understanding and Reading the concepts is not enough to get you a high score in Exams. “Knowledge is of no value until you put it into practice”. Use a timer:Use a timer to keep you on time with each task. If you know you can read 20 pages in your book in an hour, allow yourself one hour to do it, otherwise you may find yourself still staring at the book two hours later because you drifted off or you were texting with your friend. Having Good Food and proper sleep will HelpHealthy Food, water, and juice are high of energy and protein which helps your brain to work fast and also helps in remembering what you studied. Getting enough sleep is vital to feeling and performing your best. best of luck. hope this tips are helpful for you.
